co.cask.cdap.api.flow.flowlet
Interface FlowletSpecification

All Superinterfaces:
PropertyProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultFlowletSpecification
public interface FlowletSpecification
extends PropertyProvider

This class provides specification of a Flowlet. Instance of this class should be created through the FlowletSpecification.Builder class by invoking the FlowletSpecification.Builder.with() method. 

 FlowletSpecification flowletSpecification =
  FlowletSpecification flowletSpecification =
      FlowletSpecification.Builder.with()
        .setName("tokenCount")
        .setDescription("Token counting flow")
        .setFailurePolicy(FailurePolicy.RETRY)
        .build();
